flavor_text: CARVANHA's strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls.Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this Pokemon.
If anything invades CARVANHA's territory it will swarm and tear at the intruder with its pointed fangs.On its own however this Pokemon turns suddenly timid.
CARVANHA attack ships in swarms making them sink. Although it is said to be a very vicious Pokemon it timidly flees as soon as it finds itself alone.
It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
